Xor Count =  12
x[ 7] = x[ 7] ^ x[11]    y[11]
x[ 6] = x[ 6] ^ x[10]    y[10]

x[ 4] = x[ 4] ^ x[ 8]    y[ 8]
x[11] = x[11] ^ x[ 3]    y[15]
x[10] = x[10] ^ x[ 2]    y[14]
x[ 9] = x[ 9] ^ x[ 1]    y[13]

x[14] = x[14] ^ x[10]    y[ 2]
x[13] = x[13] ^ x[ 9]    y[ 1]
